{{Infobox Company | name = MAN Diesel & Turbo | logo = | type = | genre = | fate = | predecessor = [[MAN Diesel]]
[[MAN Turbo]] | successor = | foundation = 2010 | founder = | defunct = | location_city = | location_country = | location = [[Augsburg]], [[Bavaria]], [[Germany]] | locations = | area_served = | key_people = | industry = [[Manufacturing]], [[automotive industry]], [[Marine propulsion|marine engineering]] | products = [[diesel engine|diesel]] and other [[engine]]s, [[turbomachinery]] | services = | market cap = | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | aum = | assets = | equity = | owner = | num_employees = | parent = [[MAN SE]] | divisions = | subsid = | homepage = http://mandieselturbo.com | footnotes = | intl = }} '''MAN Diesel & Turbo SE''' is multinational company based in Germany that produces large-bore [[diesel engine]]s for railway-locomotives, [[marine propulsion]] systems, [[power plant]] applications and [[turbocharger]]s. The company was formed in 2010 from the merger of [[MAN Diesel]] and [[MAN Turbo]].{{cite web|url=http://www.man.eu/MAN/en/Presse/Pressemitteilungen/index.html?qry=/MAN-XML-Content/Pressrelease/Aktuelle_Pressemitteilungen/20100326_Fusion_Diesel_Turbo |title=MAN SE: Pressemitteilungen |publisher=Man.eu |date= |accessdate=2010-04-04}} MAN Diesel & Turbo is a subsidiary of the German multi-national [[MAN SE]] corporation. The Danish part of the company was formed out of the [[Burmeister & Wain]] ship building company, and the marketing name for the largest two-stroke engines still has "B&W" in it. MAN is providing diesel engines for the [[Maersk Triple E class]] of containerships, which will be the world's largest ships.{{cite web|url=http://marinelog.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=532:2011feb0002100&catid=1:latest-news&Itemid=107|accessdate=2011-02-22|title=Maersk orders ten 18,000 TEU Triple-E containerships|date=2011-02-22}} ==See also== * [[MWM GmbH]] * [[WÃ¤rtsilÃ¤]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{official|http://mandieselturbo.com}} {{-}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Man Diesel & Turbo}} [[Category:Electrical generation engine manufacturers]] [[Category:Marine engine manufacturers]] [[Category:Manufacturing companies of Germany]] [[Category:Manufacturing companies of Denmark]] [[Category:Engine manufacturers]] [[Category:MAN SE]] [[Category:Diesel engine manufacturers]] [[de:MAN Diesel & Turbo]]
